segments.text: I notice the open cabinets and the cookie jar full to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's climbing up there like a little monkey.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate while grabbing cookiesâ€”clever kid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is right beside him, ready to catch her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But oh, the sink is overflowing behind them all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's everywhere, and the woman's just standing there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not hear the water splashing?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle's growing, soaking her shoes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could turn into a big slip-and-fall nightmare.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed out unevenly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy might topple right into the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden looks serene, unaware of the indoor havoc.
segments.speaker: PAR
